meanings.definition: A government or ruling body of five individuals or groups.
meanings.sent1: The pentarchy met to discuss important decisions for the country.
meanings.sent2: The pentarchy of elders gathered to make laws for the village.
meanings.sent3: The pentarchy couldn't agree on which color to paint the town hall.
meanings.sent4: In the pentarchy of animals, the lion was considered the king.
meanings.sent5: The pentarchy of wizards each had a unique power to protect the kingdom.

meanings.definition: A group of five coequal rulers or leaders.
meanings.sent1: The pentarchy worked together to maintain peace in the region.
meanings.sent2: The historical pentarchy of kingdoms united to face a common enemy.
meanings.sent3: The pentarchy of friends decided to go on a road trip together.
meanings.sent4: In the pentarchy of superheroes, each member had a special ability.
meanings.sent5: The pentarchy of planets in the solar system includes Earth and Mars.
